title: Handshake Medium Light Skin Tone
description: Two hands meeting in a handshake, often symbolizing agreement, greeting, or a deal. The medium-light skin tone indicates a specific representation of the people involved.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this handshake emoji depicts two hands coming together in a gesture of agreement and unity, rendered with medium-light and light skin tones respectively. Each hand is sculpted with Apple's signature smooth gradients and realistic lighting, giving them a warm, tactile feel and soft rounded edges. The subtle highlights and shadows convey a sense of trust and collaboration, making it a perfect symbol for partnership or reconciliation in digital conversations.
